metadata.synopsis: Final outcome of the avatar's evil ending, in which they've elected to set about conquering other worlds with their new forces.

2.text: *This is but the first conquest. Every realm shall quake at your power. Every tongue shall speak your name in awe. Your empire will rival the gods themselves. This world is yours. Now for the rest.*
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Player looks at the massed thralls around and the fleet of nautiloids dotted across the skyline. They pulse out a psionic command to all.

4.speaker: Narrator
4.text: *This is but the first conquest. Every realm shall quake at your power. Every tongue shall speak your name in awe. Every god shall perish in your shadow. This world is yours. Now for the rest.*
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: The enthralled masses reach for discarded weapons around them - pitchforks. staffs, spears etc - and stand at the player's beckoning. They start to beat the butts of their improvised weapons on the ground in rhythm with one another, a sort of martial stomp. We focus in on one particular pitchfork beating the ground over and over -

1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The enthralled masses reach for discarded weapons around them - pitchforks. staffs, spears etc - and stand at the player's beckoning. They start to beat the butts of their improvised weapons on the ground in rhythm with one another, a sort of martial stomp. We focus in on one particular pitchfork beating the ground over and over -

3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Match cut to: the same frame and movement, but it is now a new spear, being held by someone in a new, dark uniform.

0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wider, and we see the enthralled rabble is now a disciplined army, with matching uniforms and weaponry. All very neat and fascist. Others are shown marching out of the city in precise formation. Above  the buildings around them, a nautiloid rises into the air...
